Server.Description:
Sorcery v0.76 - Lightning + Balance! http://www.SorceryMod.com
Play 7 Days to Die as a balanced post apocalyptic zombie vanquishing Sorcerer. Through training and discovery, you'll learn how to deport the undead straight back to hell by casting elemental spells of Fire, Ice and Lightning. - Unique animations, art, effects and sounds for spells and items - Pure Spellcaster playstyle - Spellcrafting: 5 unique abilities for each unique spell - Armor Crafting: Craft Fire and Ice Armor via Conjure - Rune Crafting: Craft Fire and Ice Rune Mods via Conjure - Spell Weapon Abilities: primary, secondary, passive, charge - Sorcery Crafting Conjures: feed rituals with Essence - New Attribute: Sorcery - New Dual Skill Tree and Perks - Fire, Ice, Lightning Mastery: learn how to craft and augment spells - Spellcast Mastery: primary, secondary, passive and charge abilities - Rune Mastery: harness the power of Runes to augment your spells - Essence Mastery: demystify and awaken the elemental essence of the world to extract and craft spells and weapons with essence. - Fire, Ice, Lightning Spells: upgrade each spell with five alterations
Latest Version: 0.76 - Lightning + Balance! HOME: http://www.SorceryMod.com DISCORD: http://discord.SorceryMod.com FORUM: http://forum.SorceryMod.com WIKI: http://wiki.SorceryMod.com
**COMPATIBLE** DARKNESS FALLS (2.1+): Sorcery Modlet version is fully compatible with Darkness Falls (17.3 / latest). Under Darkness Falls Install: Manage Modlets > Download Sorcery > Ready to play!
**COMPATIBLE** RAVENHEARST (5.1+): Sorcery Modlet version is fully compatible with Ravenhearst (5.1). Under Ravenhearst Install: Manage Modlets > Download Sorcery > Open and Copy Sorcery Localization.txt contents and paste the copied Localization text into the Ravenhearst Localization.txt (at the very end, new line) > Ready to play! More Info: https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?109145-Sorcery&p=963640&viewfull=1#post963640
**NOTE** This version of Sorcery is NOT EAC safe; You must play with EAC disabled. The pure XML Modlet version of Sorcery may be used with EAC enabled: https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?109145-Sorcery
